title: Child Support Forms (Family Court Act Articles 4, 5-B)
content:
Child Support Forms (Family Court Act Articles 4, 5-B)

State Regulations

Form 4-1 - Support-petition for an order upon support agreement

Form 4-1a - Summons-support

Form 4-1b - Summons support-non-resident

Form 4-2 - Order on support agreement

Form 4-3 - Support-petition-individual

Form 4-3a - Support

Form 4-3b - Support petition addendum to request child support services

Form 4-4 - Remand commitment-undertaking

Form 4-5/5-1-d - Personal information form

Form 4-5a - Undertaking for support-cash deposit

Form 4-6 - Temporary order of support and referral to support magistrate

Form 4-6a - Referral to support magistrate and temporary order of support

Form 4-7 - Order of support

Form 4-7a - Order-after filing of objections

Form 4-8 - Income execution-clerk of court

Form 4-8a - Income execution-clerk of court

Form 4-8b - Petition to correct income execution

Form 4-8c - Order to correct income execution

Form 4-9 - Income deduction order

Form 4-9a - Income withholding for support

Form 4-9b - Generic instructions for income withholding order

Form 4-9c - Income Withholding Order/Notice for Support (IWO)

Form 4-9d - Non-IV-D Income Withholding Order/Notice for Support (IWO)

Form 4-10 - Qualified medical child support order-non-IV-D cases

Form 4-11 - Support-petition for modification

Form 4-11a - Support-order extending, modifying or terminating order of support made by Family Court or another court

Form 4-11b - Affidavit in support of modification of support

Form 4-12 - Petition-violation of support order

Form 4-12a-1 - Violation of support order

Form 4-12a-2 - Violation of support order-non-resident

Form 4-12b - Order of disposition-violation of support order

Form 4-12c - Order upon support magistrate determination of willfulness

Form 4-13 - Support-petition for enforcement of order made by another court

Form 4-13a - Support-order enforcing order made by another court

Form 4-14 - Order-entry of money judgment

Form 4-15 - Relief from support payments and commitment

Form 4-15a - Order on petition for relief from support payments and commitment

Form 4-16 - Notice of motion to quash, fix or modify conditions of a child support subpoena

Form 4-17 - Financial disclosure affidavit

Form 4-17a - Financial disclosure affidavit (short form)

Form 4-18 - Petition for support after acknowledgment of paternity-individual

Form 4-18a - Petition for support after acknowledgment of paternity-commissioner

Form 4-19 - Objection to adjusted order

Form 4-19a - Order determining objections to proposed adjustment

Form 4-19b - Order determining objections to adjusted order-COLA
Form 4-20 - Motion to vacate adjusted order of support

Form 4-20a - Affidavit in support of motion to vacate adjusted order

Form 4-21 - Order to licensing entity

Form 4-21a - Order to licensing entity to terminate suspension

Form 4-22 - Objection to support collection to unit denial of challenge to driver's license suspension

Form 4-22a - Enforcement of arrearages-driver's license suspension-determination of objections

Form 4-23 - Child support, paternity-qualified domestic relations order

Form 4-24/5-16/UIFSA-10 - Electronic testimony application and waiver of personal appearance

Form 4-24a/5-16a/UIFSA-10a - Order on electronic testimony application

Form 4-25a - Child support-motion to vacate for lack of service

Form 4-25b - Child support-affidavit in support of motion to vacate for lack of service

Form 4-26 - Child support-order on motion to vacate for lack of service

Form 4-SM-1 - Stipulation for child support

Form 4-SM-2 - Information concerning filing of objections and rebuttal in a proceeding before a support magistrate

Form 4-SM-3 - Support-findings of fact

Form UCS-111 - Child support summary form: supreme and family court

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
